display_long_description:
# Invade your living room

Command an alien armada and invade your own living room in this mixed reality action-strategy game! Position your saucers over a miniature town, and defend your Mothership from the incoming waves of human defenders.

[media]

# Keep all your saucers spinning

Upgrade your harvesters, build new units, activate your abilities, collect power pebbles... a true Commander must quickly learn how to be everywhere at once!

[media]

# Customize your fleet

The humans will keep deploying new tech, and so should you! Evolve your tactics with  more than 30 saucer variations and 8 Mothership abilities to choose from.

[media]

(Supports both hand tracking and Touch controllers).
